messages.description: Set the [S] sequence number used when generating filenames
Set the [B] batch number used when generating filenames
Request Smart Shooter to detect connected cameras
Do auto focus with specified camera
Drive live view focus motor for specified camera
Change live view zoom region for specified camera
Enable/disable live view on specified camera
Enable/disable live view zoom region on specified camera
Enable/disable live view DOF (depth of field) preview on specified camera
Start/stop video recording on specified camera
Set camera property on specified camera
Increment/decrement camera property on specified camera
Download specified photo from camera to computer
Transfer specified photo from remote node to local computer
Reshoot photo using same filename on specified camera
Format memory cards on all cameras
Retrieve current date/time from all cameras
Request latest information about specific camera(s)
Set desired live view FPS for specified camera
Set shutter button state for specified camera
Force batch numbers back in sync for all cameras
Send custom text to all External API listeners

fields.name: msg_type
fields.description: Indicates whether message is request/response or event

fields.name: msg_id
fields.description: Identifier string for message type

fields.name: msg_seq_num
fields.description: Message sequence number

fields.name: msg_user_id
fields.description: Custom user ID number

fields.name: msg_result
fields.description: Generic result field indicating success or failure

fields.name: PhotoLocation

fields.name: PhotoName
fields.description: Photo name once finally saved to disk

fields.name: PhotoOriginalName
fields.description: Original name of photo on camera

fields.name: PhotoComputedName
fields.description: Photo name generated by Smart Shooter, before filename collision check

fields.name: PhotoDateCaptured
fields.description: Data/time that photo was captured by camera

fields.name: PhotoOrigin
fields.description: Identifier for origin of photo

fields.name: PhotoFormat
fields.description: Format of photo image file

fields.name: PhotoOrientation
fields.description: Orientation of photo

fields.name: PhotoWidth
fields.description: Width of photo

fields.name: PhotoHeight
fields.description: Height of photo

fields.name: PhotoAperture
fields.description: Lens aperture of photo

fields.name: PhotoShutterSpeed
fields.description: Camera shutter speed of photo

fields.name: PhotoISO
fields.description: Camera ISO of photo

fields.name: PhotoFocalLength
fields.description: Lens focal length of photo

fields.name: PhotoFilesize
fields.description: Size of photo file

fields.name: PhotoIsImage
fields.description: Indicates whether photo is image or not (possible video file)

fields.name: PhotoIsHidden
fields.description: Indicates whether photo is hidden

fields.name: PhotoHash
fields.description: Hash of photo data contents

fields.name: PhotoBarcode
fields.description: Contains barcode text scanned from photo

fields.name: PhotoIsScanned
fields.description: Indicates if barcode has been scanned from photo

fields.name: Enable
fields.description: Generic indicator for enabling/disabling some state

fields.name: CameraPropertyType
fields.description: Specifies a camera property

fields.name: CameraPropertyValue
fields.description: Contains value for the camera property

fields.name: CameraPropertyRange
fields.description: Array of valid values for a camera property

fields.name: CameraPropertyIsWriteable
fields.description: Indicates whether a camera property can be changed

fields.name: CameraPropertyStep
fields.description: Contains range step for IncrementProperty message

fields.name: CameraAutofocusIsSupported
fields.description: Indicates if camera supports auto focus

fields.name: CameraIsFocused
fields.description: Indicates of camera auto focus action was successful

fields.name: CameraLiveviewIsSupported
fields.description: Indicates if camera supports live view

fields.name: CameraLiveviewZoomIsSupported
fields.description: Indicates if camera live view supports a zoom region

fields.name: CameraLiveviewDOFIsSupported
fields.description: Indicates if camera live view supports DOF (depth of field) preview

fields.name: CameraLiveviewFocusIsSupported
fields.description: Indicates if camera live view supports moving focus

fields.name: CameraLiveviewIsEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether camera live view is enabled

fields.name: CameraLiveviewZoomIsEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether camera live view zoom region is enabled

fields.name: CameraLiveviewDOFIsEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether camera live view DOF preview is enabled

fields.name: CameraLiveviewNumFrames
fields.description: The number of liveview frames since liveview was enabled

fields.name: CameraLiveviewFocusStep
fields.description: Specifies camera live view focus motor movement

fields.name: CameraLiveviewImage
fields.description: internal use

fields.name: CameraVideoIsSupported
fields.description: Indicates whether video recording is supported

fields.name: CameraVideoIsEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether video is being recorded

fields.name: CameraVideoElapsedTime
fields.description: Elapsed time of video recording in milliseconds

fields.name: CameraBulbIsSupported
fields.description: Indicates whether buld shooting mode is supported

fields.name: CameraBulbIsEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether buld shooting mode is enabled

fields.name: CameraMirrorLockupIsSupported
fields.description: Indicates whether mirror lockup (MLU) is supported

fields.name: CameraMirrorLockupIsEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether mirror lockup is enabled

fields.name: CameraPowersource
fields.description: Indicates camera power source

fields.name: CameraBatterylevel
fields.description: Indicates camera battery level in range 0 to 100

fields.name: CameraDownloadRate
fields.description: Transfer rate for last photo download in mbytes/sec

fields.name: CameraNumPhotosTaken
fields.description: Number of photos taken by camera

fields.name: CameraNumPhotosFailed
fields.description: Number of failed photo attempts

fields.name: CameraNumDownloadsComplete
fields.description: Number of photos downloaded from camera

fields.description: Number of failed photo download attempts

fields.description: Number of camera auto focus attempts
